column5: This Condo is fully remodeled and has a wonderful ocean view from the balcony. The beach is located directly in front of the resort with only a short walk to the beach, 61st street fishing pier and restaurants. Located in the Casa Del Mar resort that offers two tropical pools, a barbecue area and laundry facilities on site. Very close to Pleasure Pier, Moody Gardens and Schlitterbahn. Comfortably sleeps 4 adults and 1 child with 2 queen beds and junior bunk bed.
column8: Beach Front Condo In Casa Del Mar
